titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Leonard Sirowitz papers, 1947-2008 and undated RL.11262
titlestmt.author: Richard Collier

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-01-10 16:58:26 UTC.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History

did.abstract: Art Director and advertising executive at Doyle Dane Bernbach and partner in several independent agencies. Includes clippings, proofs of print advertisements, video cassettes of television commercials, photographs and slidIncludes clippings, proofs of print advertisements, video cassettes of television commercials, photographs and slides, writings, texts of speeches; award certificates, ces, writings, texts of speeches; award certificates, correspondence and other printed materials relating to Sirowitz's career at Doyle Dane Bernbach and independent agencies co-founded with Ron Rosenfeld and Marion Harper. Companies represented include Bain de Soleil, Better Vision Institute, Champion International, El Al Airlines, Mobil, Sony, Volkswagen and Yugo. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into four series: Professional Files; Print Advertisements; Writings and Speeches; and Audiovisual Materials.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: However, original audiovisual materials are closed to researchers until use copies can be produced.
Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Leonard Sirowitz papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2016.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Leonard Sirowitz papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2016-0194

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections: Arthur Einstein papers; Gotham, Inc. records; Jacqueline End papers; Lore Parker papers; Margaret Fishback papers; Simon Kornblit papers; Thomas F. Garbett papers.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Includes clippings, proofs of print advertisements, video cassettes of television commercials, photographs and slides, writings, texts of speeches, award certificates, correspondence and other printed materials relating to Sirowitz's career at Doyle Dane Bernbach and independent agencies co-founded with Ron Rosenfeld and Marion Harper. Companies represented include Bain de Soleil, Better Vision Institute, Champion International, El Al Airlines, Mobil, Sony, Volkswagen and Yugo. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
